attributes.action: Foreign Office to issue a travel advisory for African, Black UK citizens
attributes.additional_details:
Unarmed African-American males are 5 times more likely to be shot and killed in the US than white males the same age.

https://www.theguardian.com/us-news/2015/dec/31/the-counted-police-killings-2015-young-black-men

A worrying trend that recently led to the tragic deaths of Alton Sterling and Philando Castile

http://www.bbc.co.uk/news/world-us-canada-36721584

http://www.bbc.co.uk/news/world-us-canada-36732908

The Bahamas issues a warning to its citizens travelling abroad to the US

http://www.bbc.co.uk/news/world-latin-america-36755182
attributes.background:
For the Foreign Office to issue a travel advisory for African, Black, Mixed African or Mixed Black UK citizens travelling to the US, stressing heightened racial tensions and police shootings of African Americans.

The aim of the petition is to express solidarity and support for reform in the US.
